#summary Welcome to the high performance IndiaForce GNU/Linux Kernel
#labels Featured,Phase-Requirements,Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

Features -

  *1. Can work with 8 CPU's with support for 16 GB RAM 
  *2. Extremely fast performance on x86 and compatible CPU 
  *3. Tested in real life situations on machines varying from Laptops to Desktops. 
  *4. Works for all Debian and its affiliated distributions. 

Installation
   * Just use 'GDebi' on Ubuntu and dkpg -i on generic Debian machines, the kernel and its related files will be installed.
